comment.author: 59228772@N05
comment._content:
Over 350 Jewish soldiers served in the Finnish Defence Forces during WWII.
23 of them was killed in action. 15 in the "Winter War" of 1939-1940, and 8 in the "Continuation War" of 1941-1944. Jewish soldiers also participated in the "Lapland War" of 1944-1945 against Nazi Germans, but they suffered no casualties in that conflict.
